intro.headline: the problem
intro.byline: It's not easy stand­ing out from comp­etition.
intro.body: Identity design takes careful planning and foresight. Some companies settle for designs that don't uniquely identify them, or that are not optimized for today's digital and print environments.

intro.headline: the solution
intro.body: From logo to photo­graphy, I offer clients a range of top-tier identity design options to improve brand recognition, raise percieved value, and drive sales.

features.headline: features
features.byline: What you get when we work together
features.body:
• A comp­re­hensive brand style guide
  • A logo mark in all the standard layouts
  • A versatile identity system built on your logo and brand styles
